== Koovappady (CT) (627956) ==

== Demography & Population ==

Koovappady (CT) is a town in the [[Kunnathunad]] taluka of [[Ernakulam]] district with an area of 17.29 sq. km. and harbouring 7319 households with total population of 29339 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kakkanad]] is at a distance of 50 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 200 km. Male population is 14634 and female population is 14705. Scheduled Caste population is 2164 and Scheduled Tribes population is 38. Census Location Code of the town is 627956<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (Population 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 60 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 60 km. Railway station is at Aluva at a distance of 15 km.
